com.sitewhere.spi.asset

Interface IAssetManagement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILifecycleComponent, ITenantLifecycleComponent

    public interface IAssetManagement
extends ITenantLifecycleComponent
    Asset management interface implemented by datastores that can store assets.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Delete the asset with the given id in the given category.
      IAssetCategory deleteAssetCategory(java.lang.String categoryId)
      Delete an asset category and all contained assets.
      IAsset getAsset(java.lang.String categoryId, java.lang.String assetId)
      Get the asset for the given id in the given category.

      Update an existing asset category.

      Update an existing location asset.
